def consonant_count(str):
    return sum(1 for c in str if c.isalpha() and c.lower() not in "aeiou")

def consonant_count(s):
    return sum(1 for x in s if 'b' <= x.lower() <= 'z' and x not in 'eiou')

def consonant_count(s):
    return sum(1 for x in s.lower() if x.isalpha() and x not in "aeiou")

def consonant_count(s):
    return sum(c in "bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz" for c in s.lower())

def consonant_count(s):
    return sum([1 for c in s if c not in 'aeiou' and c.isalpha()])

def consonant_count(s):
    return sum(x.lower() in 'bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz' for x in s)
